post.title: For my first IOS project, why not start with Streams!
post.description: While developting my companies mobile application I needed to write a custom library for IOS to allow Bluetooth Classic scanning. Why not jump directly into Swift streams as my first (ever) IOS project.  What could go wrong?
post.excerpt: While working on the library  react-native-bluetooth-classic  I got my first taste of Swift Streams through the  ExternalAccessory…
